    • fromDataPack

      ChunkGenerator fromDataPack(DataView pack) throws IOException
      Creates a chunk generator based on the given data view.

      The data must be equivalent to a data-pack for WorldTemplate

      see WorldTemplate.Builder.fromDataPack(org.spongepowered.api.data.persistence.DataView)
      Parameters:
      pack - the data
      Returns:
      the created ChunkGenerator
      Throws:
      IOException
